channel.title: blog on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with

item.title: New look, same content
item.description: UPDATE: I’ve switched out the theme entirely (again) so the CSS issues should no longer be present.

item.title: Changes to the blog
item.description: In case you haven’t already noticed, I’ve made some changes to my blog recently.

item.title: Making use of gists
item.description: After stumbling upon an example of how to do so, I’ve converted all my existing blog posts to use GitHub Gists instead of inline code blocks.

item.title: More Bloggy Goodness
item.description: It’s been a bit of a busy day for me and my blog.

item.title: Once More, With Feeling
item.description: Welcome to the new blog. That’s right, I’m running my own blog once again.
